word:
"Feed My Lambs" 

     The charge given to Peter by Christ just before His ascension was, "Feed My lambs;" [John 21:15.] and this charge is given to every minister. When Christ said to His disciples, "Suffer the little children to come unto Me, and forbid them not: for of such is the kingdom of God," [Mark 10:14.] He was speaking to His disciples in all ages.
